General_Description: '''Competing Admirers''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Returning to [[Korinth]], Kassandra approached a citizen smitten with the ''[[Courtesan|hetaera]]'' [[Anthousa]].
Section_Trivia:
*The existence of ''Competing Admirers'' is dependent on the choice made in [[Monger Down]].
**If [[The Monger]] was slain at the theater, ''[[Rival Lovers]]'' is available. If the Monger was slain at the [[Sacred Cave|cave]], ''Competing Admirers'' is available.{{Fact|October 2019}}
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
